title: YG interview and Lena Waithe Interview
itunes:title: YG interview and Lena Waithe Interview
description:
Today on the show we had YG stop by, who spoke about fake love surrounding Nipsey Hussle's passing, new album and more. Also, instead of Charlamagne giving the hee haw to someone for doing something stupid, we replaced it with a surprise phone call with screenwriter Lena Waithe, who wanted to clear some things up about the actor Jason Mitchell misconduct allegations and Angela helped some listeners out during Ask Yee. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
